name: TEST RE(QuietMansion1 Special Teaser)
description:
The Quiet Mansion (formerly: KENGOHAZARD) series is finally fully compatible with 4K!
This game is in the special teaser stage and there’s still a lot of work to do.

■What is TEST RE (QuietMansion1 Special Teaser)?

QuietMansion1 (KENGOHAZARD Remake) is a game that was originally released in 2018 as KENGOHAZARD.
It’s being rebuilt with the technology and skills we currently have.
TEST RE, a special teaser for this game, is finally available on Steam!

This isn’t a Demo version, there’s another Demo version. This is just a "special teaser".

■4K HDR

Fully compatible with 4K HDR TEST RE is fully compatible with 4K HDR.
In addition, it supports 16bit HDR, which enables expression beyond normal HDR.
Please enjoy the graphics of another dimension that beautifully portrays black!

■Advanced visual effects

As a result of the success of the crowdfunding campaign,
the developers were able to obtain an ultra-high performance PC.
The game uses all the effects that were previously too heavy to use.
We’ve achieved an overwhelming visual beauty.

■Evolved Original Sound System

The Real Sound Effect (RSE),
which was introduced experimentally in past titles and received very high praise,
has been enhanced with the new Enhance Real Sound Effect (ERSE).
The 3D spatial audio creates a terrifying effect that grants you completely new horror experience!

■Last work developed by students

This series, which started as KENGOHAZARD...
Renamed to QuietMansion, crowdfunding succeeded
I got a lot of experience such as receiving an offer for the Nintendo Switch version
This is the last work that TEST RE developed when I was a student.
We hope you enjoy the last student-developed work.
